title: Emerald Grandeur: Antique Finish Kasulaperu Haaram with Diamond Accents
materials: Cubic Zirconia (CZ) / American Diamonds. The base metal is alloy-based for durability.
features: This exquisite haaram features a timeless design with a contemporary twist. The intricately crafted gold chain showcases delicate filigree work (jali). The pendant is designed with emerald and diamond accents. The heart-shaped motifs dangling from the chain are embedded with emeralds, and the main pendant is adorned with a single large emerald surrounded by cubic zirconia for maximum brilliance. The use of CZ/American diamonds adds a modern touch to this traditional design.
colors: Predominantly Gold with vibrant Green (Emeralds) and sparkling White (CZ). The traditional gold color enhances the richness of the emeralds.
occasions: and grand celebrations. Also suitable for modern parties and formal events where you want to make a statement.
description: This haaram is a stunning blend of traditional South Indian craftsmanship and contemporary design. The high-quality emeralds and Hyderabadi polish provide a luxurious and lasting shine. Its unique design is sure to turn heads and make you feel like royalty. The use of CZ allows for a grand, high-jewelry look at an accessible price point, while the 22K gold maintains the investment value.
